Package Classes

Class UserHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • Classes.UserHelper
  • public class UserHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for handling the User database and scheduler functionality. This class accesses the database through the database static class.
    Author:
    Dakota Ray Tominus

    • Method Detail

      • checkUserNameToPassword

        public static boolean checkUserNameToPassword​(java.lang.String userId,
                                              javafx.scene.text.Text userIDError,
                                              java.lang.String password,
                                              javafx.scene.text.Text userPasswordError)
        This method is used to check the user name against the password in the database. Returns true if the user name matched the password. Checks for null or empty fields and displays errors. Alerts user if password does not match user name.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user name of the user trying to log in.
        userIDError - The user name error fields for resulting errors.
        password - The users entered password.
        userPasswordError - The user password error field for password and log in related errors.
        Returns:
        A Boolean representation of whether or not the user name and password match within the database.

      • getAllUsers

        public static java.sql.ResultSet getAllUsers()
        This method is used to get all the users from the database using the provided SQL Query. Returns the result set of all users in the database.
        Returns:
        Result set of all of the users in the database.

      • getUserIdFromName

        private static java.lang.String getUserIdFromName​(java.lang.String loggedInUser)
        This method is used to get the user ID from the database using the user name. Returns the user Id for the provided user name.
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The logged in users user name.
        Returns:
        The user Id for the provided user name.

      • getUserIDFromAppointment

        public static java.lang.String getUserIDFromAppointment​(java.lang.String appointmentID)
        This method is used to get the user Id from the provided appointment. Returns User ID from the appointment ID provided
        Parameters:
        appointmentID - Appointment who's users ID is needed.
        Returns:
        The User ID associated with the provided appointment ID.

      • hasAppointmentWithin

        public static boolean hasAppointmentWithin​(int timeToCheck)
        This method is used to check if there is an appointment between now and the provided time distance. Returns true if an appointment was found.
        Parameters:
        timeToCheck - The time to check if there is an appointment within the time frame.
        Returns:
        The boolean representation of whether or not an appointment was found.

      • setUpAlertForUserNextAppointment

        public static void setUpAlertForUserNextAppointment​(javafx.scene.control.Alert alert)
        This method is used to set up alerts for users when they log in. Checks the database for upcoming appointment.
        Parameters:
        alert - The alert to be populated with data from the database.
